mapper.sql: id, dept_no, major_no, course_no, grade, semester, remark
mapper.select: select cp.id, cp.dept_no, d.name dept_name, cp.major_no, m.name major_name, cp.grade, cp.course_no, c.name course_name, c.credit, c.is_required, c.test_type, cp.semester, cp.remark from xk_course_plan cp, xk_dept d, xk_major m, xk_course c where cp.course_no = c.course_no and cp.dept_no = d.dept_no and cp.major_no = m.major_no order by cp.semester asc
